review.title: “Not a great experience for internships”
review.pros: Pros – The ability to network with other individualsThe location is fantastic and culturally excitingThe exposure to the industry in general is usefulThe external contact with other similar organisations
review.cons: Cons – The salary is far below industry standardsThe lack of guidance and training is not consistent with an internshipThe constant office politics are unnecessarily drainingThe company has a very poor and confusing structure
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – The company would be better with a more cohesive structure and clear heirarchy
